snippet: Reading about Harry Potter's adventures learning to fly his broomstick activates some of the same regions in the brain we use to perceive real people's actions and intentions....

headline.print_headline: Reading Harry Potter Gives Clues to Brain Activity
headline.main: Reading Harry Potter Gives Clues to Brain Activity

lead_paragraph: Reading about Harry Potter's adventures learning to fly his broomstick activates some of the same regions in the brain we use to perceive real people's actions and intentions.
